bibl.author: Orville Hickman Browning
bibl.title: Orville Hickman Browning to Hugh McCulloch, 20 May 1868
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book G

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to request that you will issue a warrant on the Treasurer of the United States in favor of B. Birch, Esq., Disbursing Clerk, Treasury Department, for the sum of Thirty five hundred and seventy-nine 80/100 dollars, ($3579:80,) and charge the same to the appropriations indicated below.

row.cell: Salary of Assistant Attorney for May, 1868 - - -
